name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"74ca7f94-2f7f-4b67-a80b-a6e58afadb64","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: add_range","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"73f8ba31-105b-4776-b7ea-73fd2e7ff002","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_range","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function converts a pair of lower and upper version bounds into a single FASTEN-compatible version range expression. It correctly encodes inclusive and exclusive boundaries and appends the resulting constraint to the active dependency’s constraint list.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ff76c1b6-f77d-4400-8ded-d3ec0eb789b7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This function operates as a helper within dependency extraction, encapsulating all logic related to FASTEN interval formatting.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4334a57f-e967-4b94-a78d-7f1d16afd9bb","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"6447ad82-b195-456e-b156-587c06cb0f85","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The primary purpose of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_range","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is to translate Python version comparison semantics into the interval notation required by the FASTEN schema. By doing so, it ensures that dependency version constraints are represented accurately and consistently.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c1e717d0-bfc5-430e-a1d5-deec9d96bcd1","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"1090d90a-afad-4e79-bd02-0dd6c16cc48d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed Behavior","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0555f42c-9040-459b-b688-2c2e074dc6e4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When invoked, the function evaluates the presence and inclusivity of the provided bounds:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0355835a-dd27-4f4b-9f53-ad0a96bfcbc6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Both bounds present","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"aa82ba4f-8dbb-4c2e-82a2-65eafaa602d5","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Inclusive lower and upper bounds produce a closed interval","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"27100f26-119d-4908-bd33-b44204d09353","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Inclusive lower and exclusive upper bounds produce a half-open interval","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9b468d9c-96d0-4575-9f05-99009fb71749","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Exclusive lower and inclusive upper bounds produce a half-open interval","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d40ca4ec-6108-4559-913a-abe44bb0119b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Exclusive interval","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"4fe3440c-a182-4c17-a784-1c4595aa22a1","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Only present","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"baf38d99-2544-4f2b-ba3a-c5bcb71c13cb","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Inclusive Generation","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a5ade5d1-52c5-4774-a9b2-609f4a989621","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"add_range","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" enables accurate and expressive dependency version modeling. It allows FASTEN consumers to reason about version compatibility and constraint intersections across dependencies.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b18dff70-c945-437c-a1fd-2aedaf2a4dd5","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"6ebd7cf3-e255-43bc-a899-162a50fa10a7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Considerations","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ed55fe4c-0d0c-4466-88ef-223480d3f3c7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Encapsulates complex interval logic in a single helper","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9e184db8-8f7c-4b87-9246-85f6104b0d99","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Reduces duplication and improves readability in dependency parsing","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0c658df0-bae7-4495-9d4e-4fc7c375ab70","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ensures consistent constraint formatting","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"299374aa-415b-475f-a504-64405eef5df5","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Closely aligned with FASTEN version constraint conventions","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cc3ee74b-1cdf-4ca3-9b95-abf00ffe4d0f","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"ca02c6c4-9c27-4d3c-a3bb-b688956138ba","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
